document.full_text: the decision for the 2018 winter olympics host depends on the geographic dilemma of whether the games should go to new territories in asia or to the alps, a senior ioc member said on thursday.
document.title: alps v asia, ioc faces geographic dilemma for 2018
lines_and_colors: the decision for the 2018 winter olympics host depends on the geographic dilemma of whether the games should go to new territories in asia or to the alps, a senior ioc member said on thursday.
